review: Very good device.  I enjoyed it so much I bought a second.  Everything on it works and works fast, doesn't get much better or easier.  I have two complaints that I'm sure could be easily fixed with a software upgrade.  The first being with my 2nd device I had to sit through the intro video again.  The second complaint is that it will often hang while verifying the pin to watch a show.  Having kids with access to the TVs this is something that matters a lot to me.  Only fix I've been able to find is disable the pin security.
